name: Small Obsidian Elemental
resistance: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon attack deals one extra die of its damage when the obsidian elemental hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the obsidian elemental dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) slashing damage and 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Molten Glass
traits.desc: A creature that hits the obsidian elemental with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The obsidian elemental makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
